pullRequest.title: KEYCLOAK-15806: Extension to SignatureAlgorithm to support more Algorithms
pullRequest.bodyText:
Extension to SignatureAlgorithm to support more Algorithms (RSA_SHA256_MGF1, RSA_SHA512_MGF1).
Also included in realms.js so it can be chosen as signature algorithm when brokering through SAML.

nodes.bodyText: These changes should be done consistently also for SAML clients.

beforeCommit.message:
KEYCLOAK-15806:
    Extension to SignatureAlgorithm to support more Algorithms (RSA_SHA256_MGF1, RSA_SHA512_MGF1).
    Also included in realms.js so it can be chosen as signature algorithm when brokering through SAML.

    Also included in clients.js and realms.js so it can be chosen as signature algorithm when connecting as SAML client and when brokering through SAML.
